titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: Sherwood Raymond Roberts (1845-1928) was a conchologist and a member of the Academy of Natural Sciences. He was elected to the Academy in 1866, and was one of the first members of the Academy's Conchological Section. His main interest was in Cypraeidae, and he published a monograph on this family in 1885. His collection of Cypraeidae specimens is now among the holdings of the Academy.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of four letters to Roberts (1869-1922) from colleagues, and an annotated proof of a monograph of the family Cypraeidae (notes dated 1928), with notes inserted and several photos pasted in.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
